A4.text: Madejski became chairman of the Football League club Reading F.C. in 1990.

A5.text: In 2012, Madejski planned to relinquish control of the club by selling a 51% stake for Â£40 million to Thames Sports Investments, a Russian consortium headed by Anton Zingarevich.
